getting kicked from a mach should not be a bannable offense, playing as a solo player in the lower ranks you are Q'd with complete and utter trolls not only is it near impossible for you to rank up, but you are getting slapped with 7 day ban just because you failed to get the clutch or kick this is bull shit, the 7 day ban is what leads to people making new accounts and when hacking, why play the game when its just easier to hack and keep your rank there is more hackers in prime know days
